thread.title: SM Energy Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend
thread.title_full: SM Energy Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend

title: SM Energy Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend
text: E&P [SM Energy’s](https://www.hartenergy.com/companies/sm-energy-co) board approved an increased quarterly cash dividend of $0.18 per share of the company’s common stock outstanding, according to a Dec. 28 press release. The dividend will be payable on Feb. 5, 2024, to stockholders on record by Jan. 19, 2024.
